## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Group
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric pole at position (13.083, 10.583) - Status: NOT PLUGGED IN ELECTRIC NETWORK
- Small electric pole at position (9.5, 13.5) - Connected to lab at position (10.5, 10.5)
- Small electric pole at position (12.807, 10.807) - Status: NOT PLUGGED IN ELECTRIC NETWORK
- Small electric pole at position (14.5, 9.5) - Connected to lab at position (10.5, 10.5)
- Small electric pole at position (12.929, 10.714) - Status: NOT PLUGGED IN ELECTRIC NETWORK

### Furnace Group
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) - Status: NO INGREDIENTS, fuel: 13 coal
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0) - Status: NO INGREDIENTS, fuel: 6 coal
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0) - Status: NO INGREDIENTS, fuel: 20 coal

### Wooden Chest
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest at position (5.5, 0.5) - Inventory contains 160 iron plates.

### Lab
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (10.5, 10.5) - Status: NO POWER, research: automation.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting electric poles
- Ensure that electric poles are placed within the range of each other and connected properly to avoid "NOT PLUGGED IN ELECTRIC NETWORK" status.

### Errors when checking power sources
- Regularly verify the power status of connected entities to ensure they are receiving power. If an entity shows "NO POWER," check the connections and power supply.

### Errors related to furnace ingredients
- Ensure that furnaces have the necessary ingredients to smelt. If a furnace shows "NO INGREDIENTS TO SMELT," check the input inventory and supply chain.

### General placement errors
- Make sure to check the surrounding area before placing any structures to avoid placing them in occupied tiles.
